mapper.insert: insert into report_annex (id, report_id, path, url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update report_annex set report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, report_id, path, url, create_time, update_time from report_annex
